languages.text: "Остынь, законник, и чеши языком повежливее — я, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, неприкасаем{mf||а} для тебя. Все понял?"
"Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"
languages.original_text: "Остынь, законник, и чеши языком повежливее — я, Вольный Торговец {name} фон Валанциус, неприкасаем{mf||а} для тебя. Все понял?"

traits.locale_text: "Cool off, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and you cannot touch me. Catching my drift?"
"Cool off, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and you cannot touch me. Catching my drift?"
"Stand down, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and I am untouchable. Understood?"
"Stand down, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and I am untouchable. Understood?"
"Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"
"Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"
"Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"
"Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

languages.text: "Ganz ruhig, Gesetzeshüter, und zeigt ein wenig Respekt – mein Name ist {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, und soweit es Euch betrifft, bin ich unantastbar. Haben wir uns verstanden?"
languages.original_text: "Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

traits.locale_text: "Ganz ruhig, Gesetzeshüter, und zeigt ein wenig Respekt – mein Name ist {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, und soweit es Euch betrifft, bin ich unantastbar. Haben wir uns verstanden?"
"Ganz ruhig, Gesetzeshüter, und zeigt ein wenig Respekt – mein Name ist {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin} {name} von Valancius, und soweit es Euch betrifft, bin ich unantastbar. Verstehen wir uns?"

languages.text: « Un peu de retenue, et surtout, tâchez de faire montre d'un peu plus de respect. Je suis {name} von Valancius, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et, en ce qui vous concerne, je suis intouchable. Nous nous comprenons, j'espère ? »
languages.original_text: "Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

traits.locale_text: « Un peu de retenue, et surtout, tâchez de faire montre d'un peu plus de respect. Je suis {name} von Valancius, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et, en ce qui vous concerne, je suis intouchable. Nous nous comprenons, j'espère ? »

« Un peu de retenue, et surtout, tâchez de faire montre d'un peu plus de respect. Je suis {name} von Valancius, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, et, en ce qui vous concerne, je suis intouchable. Vous voyez ce que je veux dire ? »

languages.text: “冷静点，法务官，对我放尊重点。我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，对你而言，我是不可触及的存在。能明白我的意思吗？”
languages.original_text: "Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

traits.locale_text: “冷静点，法务官，对我放尊重点。我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，对你而言，我是不可触及的存在。能明白我的意思吗？”
“冷静点，法务官，对我放尊重点。我是行商浪人{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，对你而言，我是不可触及的存在。听明白我的意思了吗？”

languages.text: «Cálmese, agente, y tráteme con el respeto que merezco. Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, y, en lo que a usted respecta, soy intocable. ¿Nos entendemos?».
languages.original_text: "Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

traits.locale_text: «Cálmese, agente, y tráteme con el respeto que merezco. Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, y, en lo que a usted respecta, soy intocable. ¿Nos entendemos?».
«Cálmese, agente, y tráteme con el respeto que merezco. Soy {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente {name} von Valancius, y, en lo que a usted respecta, soy intocable. ¿Me explico?».

languages.text: 「法執行官、落ち着け。少しは敬意を払ったらどうだ？{mf|俺|私}はローグトレーダーの{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。君の立場では、{mf|俺|私}に指一本触れられるわけがないってことは、わかるな？」
languages.original_text: "Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

traits.locale_text: 「法執行官、落ち着け。少しは敬意を払ったらどうだ？{mf|俺|私}はローグトレーダーの{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。君の立場では、{mf|俺|私}に指一本触れられるわけがないってことは、わかるな？」
「法執行官、落ち着け。少しは敬意を払ったらどうだ？{mf|俺|私}はローグトレーダーの{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスだ。君の立場では、{mf|俺|私}に指一本触れられるわけがないってことは、わかるな？」

languages.text: "Ağır ol kanuncu! Haddini bil, karşında Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius var. Açık konuşmak gerekirse bana dokunacak kişi daha anasının karnından doğmadı. Anlatabiliyor muyum?"
languages.original_text: "Cool it, lawman, and show some respect — the name is Rogue Trader {name} von Valancius, and as far as you're concerned, I am untouchable. Do we understand each other?"

traits.locale_text: "Ağır ol kanuncu! Haddini bil, karşında Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius var. Açık konuşmak gerekirse bana dokunacak kişi daha anasının karnından doğmadı. Anlatabiliyor muyum?"
"Ağır ol kanuncu! Haddini bil, karşında Hür Tacir {name} von Valancius var. Açık konuşmak gerekirse bana dokunacak kişi daha anasının karnından doğmadı. Anlatabiliyor muyum?"
